trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can run under uwsgi. It's safe to use multiple workers processes (the shared file cache uses file locking to allow concurrency):
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, you can run under uwsgi. It's safe to use multiple workers processes (the shared file cache uses file locking to allow concurrency):

trans-unit.source: An HTTP frontend for public and private S3 buckets so that pip can install packages from S3.
trans-unit.target: An HTTP frontend for public and private S3 buckets so that pip can install packages from S3.

trans-unit.source: If you want to listen on a different port, just set the PORT variable:
trans-unit.target: If you want to listen on a different port, just set the PORT variable:

trans-unit.source: If you want to put this behind Nginx or Apache, use a socket instead:
trans-unit.target: If you want to put this behind Nginx or Apache, use a socket instead:

trans-unit.source: It works by wrapping pip. You run 'pipsss' instead of 'pip' - pipsss starts a web server in the background and then passes your CLI parameters to pip. At the moment you need to add an extra-index-url to the command line but in the future we might have pipsss add that itself.
trans-unit.target: It works by wrapping pip. You run 'pipsss' instead of 'pip' - pipsss starts a web server in the background and then passes your CLI parameters to pip. At the moment you need to add an extra-index-url to the command line but in the future we might have pipsss add that itself.

trans-unit.source: It's based on https://github.com/rhelmer/caching-s3-proxy and supports many of the same features. Thank you rhelmer!
trans-unit.target: It's based on https://github.com/rhelmer/caching-s3-proxy and supports many of the same features. Thank you rhelmer!

trans-unit.source: You can still use the web server in a standalone mode. It works like caching-s3-proxy.
trans-unit.target: You can still use the web server in a standalone mode. It works like caching-s3-proxy.

trans-unit.source: provides an unauthenticated plain HTTP proxy so pip can install packages from S3
trans-unit.target: provides an unauthenticated plain HTTP proxy so pip can install packages from S3
